txt.en:
'Hail, Beorning. A matter has come up regarding your kinsmen. I could use your aid.

'I am Thorlind, chief hunter of Felegoth.  This is the situation: A pair of Beorning traders, siblings I believe, were present in Felegoth when King Thranduil ordered the realm closed. They left, taking the path west, but never reached The Forest Gate. I then sent one of my scouts, Glenneth, to find them. She, too, has gone missing. I fear they did not simply lose their way in the forest.

'Meet me on the path south of here. We will follow their trail and see where it leads us.'
Beorning travellers and an Elf scout are missing in the forest. Thorlind, the chief hunter of Felegoth, is concerned that something troubling is afoot.
Thorlind can be found on the path south of Felegoth.\n\nYou should talk to Thorlind.
Thorlind can be found on the path south of Felegoth.\n\nYou should find Thorlind.
Thorlind waves you over as you approach
'Ah, there you are. Ready to begin?'
Find Thorlind on the path south of Felegoth

'May I ask for your assistance, [placeholder]? A matter has been brought to my attention, and I could use the aid of someone battle-tested, like yourself.

'I am Thorlind, chief hunter of Felegoth. This is the situation: A pair of Beorning traders, siblings I believe, were present in Felegoth when King Thranduil ordered the realm closed. They left, taking the path west, but never reached The Forest Gate. I then sent one of my scouts, Glenneth, to find them. She, too, has gone missing. I fear they did not simply lose their way in the forest.

'Meet me on the path south of here. We will follow their trail and see where it leads us.'
